#Stocktowatch: $BNTX

#BioNTech (NASDAQ: BNTX) shares jumped more than 10% on Tuesday after the BioNtech and its 🇺🇸 partner #Pfizer increased its manufacturing target for the #COVID19 #vaccine to 2.5B dosses by end of 2021.

#StockMarket #stocks #NASDAQ #coronavirus #Biotech https://t.co/6nfqVsGJYa
